question: Given, a current carrying wire of non-uniform cross-section, which of the following is constant throughout the length of wire?
choices: Current, electric field and drift speed
explanation: In a series circuit (or single wire), due to conservation of charge, the rate of flow of charge (Current, I) must be the same at all cross-sections.
Drift velocity $v_d = I/(nAe)$ depends on Area A, so it varies.
